awd_titl_txt: A Data-Driven Approach to Programming Multiprocessor        Systems
awd_abstract_narration: The purpose of this research project is to attack the issues of                 programming and performance evaluation of multiprocessor systems.               This is done by a systematic selection of several representative                problems in the numerical as well as the non-numerical domain and               their implementation on a machine based on Inmos Transputers.                   Comparison with off-the-shelf multiprocessors (e.g. Sequent and                 Alliant) will be undertaken.  The work will proceed with theoretical            efforts in developing highly programmable user environments as well as          experimental work in assessing the validity of the functional parallel          programming approach.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division of Computing and Communication Foundations
